title: Raaga Rosa Jhumkis - Antique Rose Quartz Stud Earrings
materials: Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds). Features traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: These earrings showcase an oval cabochon cut rose quartz center, surrounded by a halo of polki diamonds in a traditional Kundan setting. The intricately detailed gold setting adds depth and character, showcasing a unique antique finish.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
or as a sophisticated everyday accessory. Perfect for a Seemantham ceremony or a traditional half-saree function.
description: These Raaga Rosa Jhumkis blend traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship with the subtle beauty of rose quartz. The polki diamonds and Kundan setting add a touch of regal elegance, while the antique finish lends a timeless appeal. This piece is a true heirloom, crafted with meticulous detail for lasting beauty and significance.
